name: HistoryOfGuillainBarreSyndrome
title: History of Guillain Barre Syndrome
description: This value set is intended to represent a history of Guillain Barre Syndrome related to an immunization. However, due to relational complexity of the disease to the cause for SNOMED, only the history can be addressed within the code(s).
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set is to represent a valid reason for not receiving an immunization to satisfy the intent of the screening and providing the immunization as appropriate.),(Data Element Scope: This value set is to represent a history of Guillain Barre Syndrome due to an immunization),(Inclusion Criteria: Code(s) to represent a history of Guillain Barre Syndrome),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes that do not represent a history of Guillain Barre Syndrome)
